The Armarkat Cat Scratching Post is a great choice. As for assembly, I've got good news for you: the Armarkat Cat Scratching Post is relatively easy to assemble, and most owners have reported a straightforward and hassle-free experience.

Here's what you can expect:

* The scratching post comes with a simple and clear instruction manual.
* The assembly process typically takes around 15-30 minutes, depending on your level of DIY comfort.
* The scratching post consists of a few main parts: the base, the column, and the top perch. These parts are easy to connect using the included screws and Allen wrench.
* Some owners have reported that the assembly process might require a bit of force to connect the parts, but it's still manageable.

To make the assembly process even smoother, here are some tips:

* Read the instruction manual carefully before starting the assembly process.
* Make sure you have all the necessary tools, including the Allen wrench and screws.
* Take your time and assemble the scratching post on a flat, stable surface.
* If you encounter any issues or have questions, you can contact Armarkat's customer support for assistance.

Overall, the Armarkat Cat Scratching Post is a great choice, and the assembly process is relatively easy. With a little patience and attention to the instructions, you'll have it set up and ready for Luna to enjoy in no time!
